properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 2:45PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Lakeshore Flood Advisory, which is in effect from 7 PM EST /6 PM
CST/ this evening to 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ Sunday.

* LAKE SHORE FLOODING...25 to 30 MPH Northeast winds shifting to
northwest overnight. Waves of 8 to 10 feet are possible.

* TIMING...Starting Saturday evening. Conditions will improve
Sunday morning.

* IMPACTS...Beach erosion and minor flooding along the immediate
shoreline.
properties.instruction:
A Lakeshore Flood Advisory indicates that onshore winds will
generate flooding of low areas along the lakeshore.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM EST /6 PM CST/ THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST /6 AM CST/ SUNDAY
